title: Paris/8th arrondissement
name: Avenue Peugeot
price: Daily (incl. Sundays) 8:30AM-8PM/11PM (longer opening hours Thu-Sat, summer and Christmas period)
content: While not as spectacular from the outside as it's sister brand Citroen's building, the Avenue Peugeot is also worth a visit if you are a car fan, as it always has a temporary exhibition of some of Peugeot's concept or competition cars the brand is famous for. You can obviously also explore the regular range of Peugeot cars and purchase one, as well as an extensive range of Peugeot merchandise from the on-site "boutique Peugeot", including the Peugeot condiment grinders the company makes for much longer than it does build cars.
